name: Pigeon Panic!
description:
The infamous New York City based B.E.R.D (Bureaucrats Eradicating Repulsive Doves) Co. has finally had enough. The corporation has unveiled a city-wide plan to relocate all doves, pigeons, and other nefarious fowl to the worst place they can think of: New Jersey. 

Word spread fast among the pigeons of the city. This cannot be allowed to happen. All of the prime spots for food, seed, and bobbing would be forever lost. Many of your kind fled for better vistas, but not you. You and your closest friends decided to assemble a team and take down B.E.R.D Co. once and for all.
